metadata.title: CVE-2023-31047 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
In Django 3.2 before 3.2.19, 4.x before 4.1.9, and 4.2 before 4.2.1, it waspossible to bypass validation when using one form field to upload multiplefiles. This multiple upload has never been supported by forms.FileField orforms.ImageField (only the last uploaded file was validated). However,Django's "Uploading multiple files" documentation suggested otherwise.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-31047` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python-django - 1:1.11.11-1ubuntu1.21
python-django-common - 1:1.11.11-1ubuntu1.21
python3-django - 1:1.11.11-1ubuntu1.21
No subscription required

criterions.comment: python-django package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:1.11.11-1ubuntu1.21').
